programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Island of the Devil
programme.desc: Just 460,000 people live in Tasmania, an island off the southeast coast of mainland Australia. While its human population is small, the majestic state is rich in natural wonders and is known for its large tracts of pristine wilderness.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Congo: the Untamed Heart
programme.desc: Known for centuries as Africa's Dark Heart, the Congo is a multi-layered, three-dimensional world, seething with innumerable species. By peeling back the layers, we discover how this vast rainforest works, and expose the hidden lives of its inhabitants.

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Malaysia: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: Malaysia is one of a handful of countries in the world described as mega-diverse. Malaysia's animals and plants have exploited every opportunity to carve out an existence and so have adapted to some very strange ways of life.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Nile: An African Odyssey
programme.desc: The Nile is the longest river in the world. Ancient Egypt, one of the history's most powerful civilizations, depended hugely upon it. Each year, it flooded, replenishing the fields with fertile silt. This automatic irrigation fueled Egypt's economy.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: The Andes: World in the Clouds
programme.desc: The longest chain of mountains in the world, the Andes run the length of western South America and dictate the climate for the whole continent. They include some of the highest peaks outside the Himalayas.

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones. Starring: Johnny Depp, Frank Langella, Lena Olin

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: A blind girl receives a cornea transplant so that she is able to see again. However, she gets more than she bargains for when she realizes she can see disturbing ghosts.

programme.title: Set Up

programme.title: Runaway Jury

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: An inside look at Full Custom Garage.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian takes on a new challenge for a high-end car show.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian goes on the hunt for his biggest build yet.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka learns that her father's former business partner deals in a highly addictive drug called F lash.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The Andromeda discovers her sister ship, the Pax Magellanic. The crew aboard Pax is 300 years old, but have not aged a day.

programme.title: Andromeda: Music of a Distant Drum
programme.desc: Tyr crash lands the Eureka Maru on a Nietzschean planet and develops amnesia. He must remember what he is doing before the Nietzscheans discover him and his crate of stolen goods.

programme.title: Andromeda: Harper 2.0
programme.desc: Harper receives the gift of knowledge from a dying Perseid, only to discover that the Perseid was being sought by a bounty hunter who has now turned his attention to Harper.

programme.title: Andromeda: Forced Perspective
programme.desc: Dylan is arrested for assassinating a dictator 300 years ago.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Sum of Its Parts
programme.desc: Andromeda is boarded by a drone from the Consensus of Parts, a mythical mechanical society. While friendly at first, the drone tries to force the ship to join the Consensus.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: A Bump in the Night
programme.desc: In 1980, six-year-old Alicia O'Reilly was raped and murdered in her bed, while her sister slept less than a metre away, and her mother sleeping across the hallway.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: “Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to connect with the spirit of 53-year-old, Cynthia Greenwood-Smith, to unravel the lies and discover the grim truth surrounding her disappearance from her Gold Coast home in 2001.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: Our new team of “ Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to unmask the killer – or killers – of vivacious New Zealand hairdresser Paula Brown who was plucked from Sydney’s downtown after a night out with friends.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Without Warning
programme.desc: This week’s episode of Sensing Murder promises greater co-operation between psychics and police, attempting to uncover the truth about the death of 18-year-old apprentice plumber Regan O’Donoghue, who was killed in a hit and run in 2007.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Ivan Milat: The Backpacker Murders
programme.desc: The backpacker murder case in the Belanglo State Forest, south west of Sydney, has entered Australian criminal folklore.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: No Mercy: The Killing of Virginia Morse
programme.desc: The horrific story of killers Allan Baker and Kevin Crump who began their murderous spree in rural NSW by killing a complete stranger for $20, a packet of cigarettes and a couple of litres of petrol.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Murder of Innocence: Sian Kingi
programme.desc: On 27 November 1987, 12-year-old Noosa school girl Sian Kingi was grabbed off her push bike by Valmae Fay Beck and Barrie John Watts as she rode home from school.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Snowtown: Bodies in the Barrels
programme.desc: In 1999, eight bodies are found in six barrels filled with acid in a former bank vault in rural Snowtown, 50 kilometres north of Adelaide.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Ducks On The Pond
programme.desc: Tess tries to realize some cash from Drovers Run without hurting Claire. One of the shearers Claire hired disappears; did he leave because his wife was in labor, or was he murdered?

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Don't Mess With The Girls
programme.desc: It's time for the annual rodeo. Claire wants to ride Jack's horse Sirocco to a championship, and Tess tries to get Becky to report being raped.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Who's The Boss
programme.desc: Claire buys a herd of thin sheep at an auction to fatten up and resell. Jodi finds she did badly on her examination. Tess applies her mother's therapist techniques to encourage the women at Drovers Run to open up emotionally and bond.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Taking The Reins
programme.desc: Tess tries to improve her riding skills. Sirocco becomes severely ill. Jodi wants to go out at night and party like she thinks Becky does.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Reality Bites
programme.desc: Meg and Claire discover more about Becky's home life when she temporarily returns to work at her parents' truck stop.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Pride And Joy
programme.desc: A feral bull is wreaking havoc at Drovers Run and Tess trades in her cappuccino machine for a daily cow.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The Victorian Order of Nurses takes the pressure off hospitals by providing care for people in their own homes. Hundreds of rival companies compete for cash and customers.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive “behind the scenes” look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. She’s a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her “Frugal Flynn” because she watches the pennies to protect profit.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Due Date With Death
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Rochester, New York to investigate the Rochester Public Library's 15 years of claims. There's reason to believe that two deaths associated with the building could be behind the activity.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Innocent Until Proven Dead
programme.desc: TAPS has been called to Louisville, Kentucky to help three descendants find out if their ancestors arestill inhabitingthe property they owned in the 1800's.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Rockets Red Scare
programme.desc: TAPS travels back in time, to the 1700's to investigate the renowned USS Constitution, \\"Old Ironsides\\", which is docked in Boston, Massachusetts.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: 1st Edition Apparition
programme.desc: TAPS is revisiting Edith Wharton's home, The Mount, in Lenox, Massachusetts. It's believed Edith andher husband could be behind increased activity since the team's last investigation in 2008.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: All Aboard the Ghost Train
programme.desc: This historic roundhouse and rail yard is connected to more that just old trains. The frightening remnants of a serial killer, horrific accidents and one of the worst train crashes have two people questioning strange encounters.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Make a Wish
programme.desc: Dog shows his love of justice and children in this poignant episode. He begins by giving encouragement to a group of handicapped children, then starting the search for Jacob, a fugitive who's abandoned his wife and children.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tough Love
programme.desc: Michael is out on bail for drug sales, theft, and violation of parole. Dog's after him for failing to appear in court and his only lead is Jen, his co-signer and girlfriend.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise Ending
programme.desc: Dog and the boys are going after a fugitive with a $25,000 bond and a string of theft charges behind him. When the team hits his apartment, they find a boot print on the door, a souvenir of a police raid from only days earlier?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Big Wipe-Out
programme.desc: A Hawaiian surfing hero is on a wave to nowhere and it's Dog's turn to play lifeguard. "Buttons," known throughout the islands for his prowess on the waves and his daring 360's, has wiped-out on the rocky shoals of drug addiction.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: You Can Bet On It!
programme.desc: Kristine had a string of gambling and forgery charges before she jumped bail leaving Dog "holding the bag". Now it's time for Dog to call in some chits of his own, getting the help of trusty informants he's helped out over the years.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fly Boy
programme.desc: Dog told him not to go, but Charles went anyway, skipping to Oregon against the terms of his bail. Now Dog has a tip that Charles plans to slip back into Honolulu. With $30,000 on the line Dog knows he can leave little to chance.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Guns & Ice
programme.desc: The following day is Dog's birthday but that won't stop him from chasing a fugitive, who is facing firearms charges. Dog doesn't relish the thought of going after an alleged gunslinger on his birthday but he's never one to avoid a challenge.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Good Fight
programme.desc: Dog and Beth have to be at the state capitol bright and early to receive an award for their fight against ice in Hawaii. Afterwards, they're inspired to start the hunt for Shanna, an alleged ice user and identity thief with $80,000 in bonds.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Smackdown of Baby Lyssa
programme.desc: After meeting with the cosigner on a bond for a man named John, Dog and the Posse hatch a plan to lure him to a high rise apartment. But when night falls, their plan leaves a member of the team alone and in harm's way!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Friend in Need
programme.desc: Roger has 27 prior arrests, spent years in jail and doesn't want to go back. But he's missed court and now Dog has to bring him in. To complicate matters, this fugitive lives in a tightly-knit community where good information won't come easy.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Your Lying Eyes
programme.desc: Kolani's on the run, left his wife to look after four kids and left Dog holding the bag for the $10k bond. So their pursuit on this case takes them into some parts of Ohau, and the human heart, that few of us will ever see.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Alan in Charge
programme.desc: Jase and the guys convince Willie to hire his older brother Alan to work at Duck Commander, but when Alan begins micromanaging everyone, they quickly change their mind. Meanwhile, the ladies take a self-defense class and use John Luke as a punching bag.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Renaissance Men
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Van He'llsing
programme.desc: When Missy and Jase's son Reed purchases an old van to boost his music career, his parents begin to question some of his choices. Meanwhile, Willie helps Jep prepare River for a competitive wrestling league by introducing him to his friend.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Toad to Perdition
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: RV There Yet?
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a road trip to Liberty University where they will drop off John Luke and Mary Kate for their first year of college. Along the way, they stop in Nashville to visit Willie's friend Colt Ford.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie & Korie's Anniversorry
programme.desc: The Robertson family throws a party for Willie & Korie's 25th anniversary, but things take a dramatic turn when Willie and Korie reveal a big secret. Meanwhile, when Jase blames Uncle Si for getting him a parking ticket.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Statue of Imitations
programme.desc: When Willie asks a local chainsaw artist to make him a statue, he gets a big surprise when it's revealed that the statue is of an unlikely subject - Willie himself. Meanwhile, Jep and Jessica attempt to help Kay with her hoarding.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Decent Proposal
programme.desc: On a trip to New York, Jase's son Reed proposes to his girlfriend, which inspires his father to fan the flames of romance back home with Missy. Meanwhile, Sadie asks Willie to be a guest lecturer at her business class.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons
programme.desc: The inmates in the Carcel Distrital in Colombia fight many battles: against other prisoners, against the guards and most of all against themselves. It's a battle that most of them lose.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons
programme.desc: The Carcel Distrital is located in one of the most dangerous quarters of Bogotá. Nearly 950 men and 50 women are imprisoned here.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons
programme.desc: El Hongo is a high-security bunker in Mexico´s desert. With sensors, cameras, mobile phone jammers, this prison is a veritable high-tech fortress.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons
programme.desc: Once, inmates in Armenian prisons fell into the hands of the "Thieves in Law," a criminal brotherhood rejecting state authority and living by its own code.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons
programme.desc: La Mesa, A Mexican prison just over the US border. The inmates? Drug traffickers, rapists, cartel killers. They have tough times ahead.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Super Freak
programme.desc: Khasha says Jermaine is always too busy for her and doesn't respect her. Jermaine says his young girlfriend wants sex all the time and is extremely messy! Can Judge Toler help them find a middle ground?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hot Girl Summer
programme.desc: Shortly after tying the knot Diana gave Robert an ultimatum: they'd either have an open relationship or she was gone. He wants to save the marriage, but she isn't ready to compromise. Can Diana finally settle with one man, or is this really the end?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Firecracker
programme.desc: Gary claims Ebony's verbally abusive, acts like a dictator and is frustrated with her disrespectful comments. She loves Gary very much and claims to be a 'ride or die' girlfriend, but is over Gary's unmotivated, stuck in the mud ways.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Poker Face
programme.desc: Tamika and Joseph have been together 7 years before marrying, but now his gambling addiction plus their new baby has worn the two out. Joseph’s excessive gambling habits are draining their life’s savings and he refuses to get the help he needs.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Tapped Out
programme.desc: Lataisha says Chris smokes weed all day and can’t keep a job. Things seemed to be going fine until one day she walked downstairs in their home and realized that Chris moved out. Chris says he left because she is too aggressive.

programme.title: Divorce Court: I Scream U Scream
programme.desc: Sharee moved in with Brandon shortly after they met, had a child and still no marriage. Brandon wants her to get a full-time job and not work part-time in their business before they get married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: What Women Want
programme.desc: La'Tanya is honest to Jonathan with her sexual attraction tp other women. The final straw was when her kids came home singing "Jonathan is a bad daddy" after returning from a relative's house. Will Lynn send them separate ways?

programme.title: Divorce Court: King of Kings
programme.desc: Joel claims he is a king looking for his queen. He says that him and Jerrica would succeed if she would just fall in line in his kingdom. Jerrica says she can no longer accept Joel’s list of rules and take his verbal abuse. She is ready to walk away.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Pour Up Drank
programme.desc: Floyd Steven’s jealousy is leading Alqueisha “Quey” Benjamin to consider breaking it off. Quey is becoming an alcoholic because of his controlling ways, but Floyd has caught her in a few lies and suspects her of cheating!

programme.title: Divorce Court: Super Freak
programme.desc: Khasha says Jermaine is always too busy for her and doesn't respect her. Jermaine says his young girlfriend wants sex all the time and is extremely messy! Can Judge Toler help them find a middle ground?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Down in the DM
programme.desc: Clifford feels that Asia is always searching for things that aren’t there. Asia says she is done with Clifford and the way he uses social media to flirt and cheat with women. Can Judge Lynn Toler help put a stop to the arguing?

programme.title: Divorce Court: What Women Want
programme.desc: La'Tanya is honest to Jonathan with her sexual attraction tp other women. The final straw was when her kids came home singing "Jonathan is a bad daddy" after returning from a relative's house. Will Lynn send them separate ways?

programme.title: Operation Repo: All In
programme.desc: The team is ahead of schedule on their Vegas mission, but will it all be derailed when Froy brings unwanted trouble back to the office? Also, Ronnie and Froy run into an unexpected dilemma when a husband's better halves take the reins.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Viva Las Vegas!
programme.desc: An Elvis impersonator gets Matt and Ronnie all shook up, and a ventriloquist's dummy has a nasty attitude that gets on Sonia's bad side. When Froy goes missing, Lou has to pick up the slack in a repo that goes terribly wrong.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Go Big or Go Home
programme.desc: Fuming over Froy's departure, Matt loses his temper on a dominatrix and her client and packs his bags to return to LA.? Down two repo men, the pressure is on Ronnie and Carlos, who interrupts a couple in the middle of their less-than-holy matrimony.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Bouquets and Blowtorches
programme.desc: The team returns from a successful mission in Vegas, but there's trouble brewing within the crew's ranks. Ronnie and Carlos repo from a self-defense instructor who lets his students do his dirty work.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Doomsday Prep
programme.desc: Matt and Froy struggle with language barriers when an Italian photographer and his assistant resort to violence because they can't comprehend. Will Sonia finally reveal what's happening, or will carrying her brother's burden get the best of her?

programme.title: Operation Repo: Sugardaddy Shakedown
programme.desc: The team wonders what's up with Sonia as she wrestles with Lou's big secret. Ronnie goes undercover and takes a gold-digging RO out on a date, but when Carlos lets the cat out of the bag all hell breaks loose.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The New Boss
programme.desc: Lou has retired, making Sonia the new boss, but will she be able to keep the company going without her big brother? Matt and Ronnie try to take a car away from a yuppie with an unusual taste for red meat.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Hayseed Inferno
programme.desc: Sonia pushes the company to repossess more than just cars, and the backlash from the team threatens to end her time in charge before it's even begun. Ronnie and Matt attempt to repo from a reckless motocross daredevil.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Bullseye!
programme.desc: Sonia, the new boss, is still struggling to keep the team in line, but when tragedy strikes on a routine repossession, her reign at the top faces its biggest challenge yet. Matt and Froy hit the club to take a sports car away from a deadbeat DJ.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Phi Alpha Fail
programme.desc: Carlos goes undercover at a frat house, but when the party gets the best of him Sonia has to step in and fight the drunken mob. Matt and Ronnie go after some wanna-be internet sensations.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Boys with Toys
programme.desc: Matt is eager to work his way onto Sonia's coveted airplane repo, despite her adamancy against him.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Bugaboo
programme.desc: Gary swoops in to help Andi. Sabrina helps Maurice prepare for an exciting event. Danni has to decide her feelings about her new situation. (S1, ep18)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Give Me The Night
programme.desc: Sabrina becomes an unlikely hero after stumbling upon a terrible incident. Andi fights back. Danni ventures out in an effort to put herself out there again. (S1, ep19)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: A Chance To Love
programme.desc: Gary's insecurities come to light. Karen and Zac find themselves in a familiar place. Danni finds herself the mediator between friends. (S1, ep20)

programme.title: The Game: The Wedding Episode
programme.desc: The third season concludes with Melanie trying to marry Derwin before Janay gives birth to Derwin's baby, even if it requires sacrificing her dream wedding.

programme.title: The Game: Parachutes...
programme.desc: Melanie and Derwin expereience trouble in paradise when Melanie takes it upon herself to swab DJ, only to find out the baby isn't Derwin's.

programme.title: The Game: ...Beach Chairs
programme.desc: Melanie deals with the backlash of having told Derwin the results of the DNA test, only to learn that the results are incorrect.

programme.title: The Game: The Confession Episode
programme.desc: Melanie musters the courage to reveal the mistaken DNA test results of Baby DJ, further driving a wedge in her marriage and sending Janay on the warpath.

programme.title: The Game: The Wing King
programme.desc: Malik continues his downward sprial of behavior, culminating in a drunken rage and assault against a police officer. He is arrested.

programme.title: The Game: It Was All Good Just A Week Ago
programme.desc: After assaulting a police offcer and getting a DUI, Malik is assured by his people that he is not going to jail. He later learns that the Saber's owner is filling him with a false sense of security in order to kick him off the team.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Connection
programme.desc: P.R.S. is called in to help a young mother tormented by an otherworldly connection to a teenage girl murdered in her neighborhood years ago. Could she have psychic ability or is there a more sinister force at work?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Requiem
programme.desc: A young woman named Kristy has been haunted in her own bedroom since she can remember. Now it's up to Ryan and the crew to help Kristy before she's overwhelmed by the entity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shape Shifter
programme.desc: PRS travels to Shapleigh, Maine where a woman and her daughter are reporting attacks from a winged creature with sharp teeth. Psychic Chip Coffey arrives and senses a half-human, half animal presence.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Sickness
programme.desc: Something is making Lisa and her family sick. Is it natural or paranormal? Ryan and the team uncover the tragic history surrounding Lisa's home--with shocking connections to respiratory illness.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Smoke and Shadows
programme.desc: Sarah believes her Parkville, MD home has been invaded by a powerful force ever since her roommate Dennis moved in. PRS investigates claims that Dennis has been attacked by the entity, a possible poltergeist.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Boy Pushed Me
programme.desc: Bruce and Danielle are terrified by an EVP recorded in their Indiana home stating "Kill them." Even more chilling, their toddler son survived a fall out of a window only to tell his parents, "Boy pushed me."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Who Is the Lurking Man?
programme.desc: PRS travels to Newcastle, CA to investigate a house with paranormal forces so strong, the family has cleared out. Ryan believes the Native American land may hold the key to the mystery and leads the team in a fight to reclaim a scared family's house.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Practice

programme.title: World's Greatest: Water Adventures
programme.desc: We are captivated by oceans, rivers, and lakes - the power, the flow, the reflective stillness. And as we seek to get closer, we immerse ourselves in an expanding range of aquatic experiences.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Bridges
programme.desc: A bridge is a structure that’s designed to transcend, but a great bridge can define the place where it stands. Symbols of human ingenuity, beauty, and grandeur, bridges connect us not only to each other but also to the past.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Wetland Animals
programme.desc: Wetland Animals dives into the swamps, rivers, and flood plains of the Everglades, Botswana’s Okavango Delta, Kakadu National Park in Australia, and the Amazon to see deadly crocodiles, piranhas, hippopotamus, flamingo, manatee, and platypus.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Global Cities
programme.desc: Travel to the centers of wealth, power, industry, and innovation. From London to Tokyo, Hong Kong to New York, these are the cities that never sleep. The influence held in these economic hubs unites the global community.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Island Nations
programme.desc: Though many are small in stature, they have punched well above their weight on the global stage. Some are rooted in ancient history, while others are only just beginning to realize their full potential.

programme.title: Arthur: Two Minutes/Messy Dress Mess
programme.desc: Power shifts in the Tibble household when the twins find out Tommy is two minutes older than Timmy. Ladonna's thrilled when Muffy loans her a beautiful recital dress, but a run-in with a painted bench creates a problem.

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Green Thumb/My Fair Tommy
programme.desc: Buster finds out that his collection of old food makes excellent compost--which makes for even better tomatoes! Then, neither of the Tibble twins has ever won the coveted "Good Behavior of the Week" cupcake award.

programme.title: Arthur: Sue Ellen Adds It Up/Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: Math, schmath. That's what Sue Ellen thinks… until she runs into a problem her artistic vision can't solve. Sue Ellen can't wait to meet her pen pal in person.

programme.title: Arthur: Paradise Lost/The Pride of Lakewood
programme.desc: Baby Kate is growing up! But strangely enough, the more words she learns, the less she seems to understand their dog. To boost school spirit, Arthur and his classmates form the Lakewood Pride Committee, but not everyone wants to join.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Chicken Pox/Sick As A Dog
programme.desc: The circus is in town and the whole family's excited—until Arthur gets CHICKEN POX! Will he recover in time? Then, Arthur's worst fears come true when poor, sick Pal has to sleep overnight at the vet's office. Could it be something he did?

programme.title: Arthur: Binky Wrestles with a Story/All Will Be Revealed
programme.desc: Binky spends the day with Bitzi Baxter and learns what it's like to be a news reporter. Then, D.W., Bud, and Rapty set out to solve the mystery of what really happened to D.W.'s snowball.

programme.title: Arthur: Show Off/Dog's Best Friend
programme.desc: It's the Elwood City dog show and Killer is facing off against Sebastian Winkleplotz, the snooty, championship-winning poodle. Arthur agrees to watch Amigo while Alberto's off at camp, but Pal gets worried.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Snow Biz/Bugged
programme.desc: Winter hits Elwood City and Arthur sees dollar signs! His snow-shoveling business is booming--that is, until Buster decides to get in on the action. And, Brain can be a know-it-all, and sometimes he really bugs people.

programme.title: Arthur: Sleep No More/Pet Peeved
programme.desc: Buster is convinced that Pizza Paula's all-you-can-eat contest is his destiny. But how can he possibly win such an important contest without any sleep? Binky volunteers to look after Francine's cat, Nemo, for the weekend.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: Japan continues its suicidal resistance, and invading it looks costly. After 2 atomic bombs, the Emperor intervenes and stops the War. Stalin grabs territory in East Asia. The War is over, and the Atomic Era and the Cold War start.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: After a careful campaign of disinformation that throws the German defenders off-guard, the Western Allies finally land on Normandy.France is liberated.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: The Western Allies secure supply routes that will allow them to enter Germany, and the Ardennes counter-offensive fails. The Red Army advances rapidly. The SS implements the Holocaust.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: The Marines succeed in the "island hopping" strategy against suicidal resistance. The US Navy establishes supremacy, cutting off Japan.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Dunkirk (September 1, 1939)
programme.desc: To keep France free, 400,000 English soldiers have manned the battlefields. Germany's strength is too great and pushes the British to the coast town of Dunkirk.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Fall of Poland
programme.desc: German tanks roll into Poland in September 1939.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Thaddius sought refuge from his struggling marriage through an online relationship with Sara. When she starts telling tales of seizures and kidnappings, he starts to question her identity.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Tiana & James
programme.desc: After a three-year online relationship, Tiana moved across the country to be with the love of her life, James, and reveal her secret. But now James seems more elusive than ever.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Tracie & Sammie
programme.desc: Tracie Thoms had a connection with a fan named 'Sammie' after hearing about the passing of Sammie's friend. Sammie suddenly disappeared and now Tracie is left wondering who Sammie really is? (S3, ep5)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Trina & Scorpio
programme.desc: Trina is a dancer who always had trouble meeting trustworthy guys, until she met Scorpio, a fellow dancer, online. Will Trina finally get to rendezvous with the only man she's ever loved? (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Tyler & Amanda
programme.desc: After a year and a half of chatting with her online, Tyler thinks he may have a future with Amanda. But are Tyler's friends correct because they suspect that something isn't right? (S1, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Tyreme met the beautiful Tomorrow online over 9 months ago. Tyreme is ready to uproot his life to be with her. Will Nev and Max be able help Tyreme finally meet his Tomorrow? (S5, ep9)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Meatball Mashup
programme.desc: S4, Ep 7. When the roommates take a trip to the Italian Shore, Snooki & Deena party so hard they wind up in bed together. Whilst back in Florence, Team Meatball has a run-in with the Italian police.

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Where Is My Boyfriend?
programme.desc: The boys spring Team Meatball from the police station after their accident. And when Snooki's boyfriend Jionni comes to visit, a romantic evening ends with Snooki sobbing alone on the street.

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Three Men and a Snooki
programme.desc: Deena panics after missing her period. After an all-night fight with Jionni, Snookie decides to take a break from the relationship. Mike tries to win her over, but someone else ends up comforting her.

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Damage Is Done
programme.desc: After Mike's prank backfires, the guys visit Vinny's family in Sicily and the girls class it up on a Tuscan wine tour. Snooki learns the truth about her hook-up with Vin and must come clean to Jionni.

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Situation Problems
programme.desc: Deena's still trying to 'do sex' with Pauly, the meatballs get an icy reception at a club, and the whole house turns on Mike after he stirs up drama one too many times. (S4, ep11)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Ciao, Italia
programme.desc: Mike's antics have proven too much and Ron demands he make amends. As the crew count down the days until their return to Seaside, Mike wonders whether or not to join them at the Shore. (S4, ep12)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Guilty Until Proven Innocent
programme.desc: Two men convicted for a brutal rape they say they didn’t commit, and DNA evidence backs them up. How did a law professor, her students and new DNA technology play a part in the case?

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Alternate Suspects
programme.desc: A football coach serves nine years in prison for the murder of his wife before a Texas Court of Criminal Appeals finds he didn't get a fair trial.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Stranger You Know
programme.desc: A report about Marti Hill, who was savagely beaten in her Prairie Village, Kansas home. She was found by police barely breathing and covered in blood.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Question of Murder
programme.desc: John Maloney, a Wisconsin police officer, was convicted of murdering his estranged wife, Sandy, in 1999. He has always maintained his innocence. After Maloney’s conviction, the prosecutor, Joe Paulus, pled guilty to accepting bribes to fix over 20 cases

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A report on the 2009 death of Rhonda Casto, who went hiking in Oregon’s Columbia River Gorge with her boyfriend, Stephen Nichols, and she never returned home.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Where's Our Baby?
programme.desc: In November 1997, Marlene and Steve Aisenberg reported their five-month-old daughter Sabrina missing from her crib. Police soon focused on the parents as authorities became convinced that they knew more about the baby’s disappearance than they admitted.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Cardinal
programme.desc: An army commander (played by guest star Theodore Bikel) plots to become dictator by imprisoning an influential cardinal and using a look-alike actor for a public endorsement.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Elixir
programme.desc: The Impossible Missions Force offers a "fountain of youth" to the vain and dictatorial widow (guest star Ruth Roman) of the late president of a small South American country in order to depose her.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Exchange
programme.desc: Cinnamon is captured and the enemy discovers the one thing that would unmask her identity and expose the Impossible Mission Force.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Bargain
programme.desc: The former dictator of a Caribbean island is made to have hallucinatory visions in which he sees his ominous destiny as part of an ingenious plot designed by the Impossible Missions Force.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Mind of Stefan Miklos
programme.desc: The Impossible Missions Force is pitted against the ingenious logic of an enemy agent (guest Steve Ihnat) as the IMF attempts to lead the agent through a maze of complicated clues in order to reach a false conclusion.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Stop! Go!
programme.desc: After playing with "Stop" and "Go" signs with Angela, Baby Bop leaves to direct some traffic of her own! Meanwhile, in the caboose, Barney and the kids enjoy a costume parade, a game of "Musical Stop & Go," and some very vigorous body movement.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: It's Hot! It's Cold!
programme.desc: Throughout the day, Barney and the children learn about "hot" and "cold," but the fun really begins when Barney turns the playground into a winter/summer wonderland!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: The Big Garden - Get Happy
programme.desc: Baby Bop wants Barney, BJ and the kids to play with her instead of working in their garden. They promise to play with her as soon as they finish. Baby Bop can't wait, and tries many ways to get them to come play with her now, none of which work.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: My Baby Brother
programme.desc: Barney reminds Baby Bop and BJ that although babies start out little, they grow fast. Through pretend play, favorite songs and fun games, they learn about the many ways we grow every day.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Puppy Love
programme.desc: Barney and the kids help Mr. Boyd prepare his dog Bingo for a trip to the veterinarian for a check, while learning lessons about caring for dogs at the same time. Meanwhile, BJ is searching for his missing baseball, which he suspects was buried by Bingo.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Play for Exercise!
programme.desc: The children are surprised to learn that playing games and having fun in the park is great exercise. Baby Bop is happy to learn that not only is she exercising while she plays, but exercise will make her grow big and strong.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ, Baby Bop and Riff can hardly wait for the petting zoo that is coming to the park. Riff feels terrible when he accidentally wrecks BJ’s beloved scooter.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Today is the big dance party in the park. Barney tells Baby Bop the story of “The Princess Without a Song to Sing.”

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Quadzilla Attacks!
programme.desc: Extreme Quadzilla ATV, the fastest 4 wheeler ever; a 1910s Remington Derringer and an 1880s Palm Squeezer pistol; revolutionary 1800s Western Electric telephone with a crank dial.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Night of the Digging Dead
programme.desc: A custom-built shark cage; 1900s pathologist's dissection toolkit; 1940s embalming pump and one of the first electric bone saws.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton-Geons & Dragons
programme.desc: While Ton soups up their new truck, Allen heads to an auction solo and encounters Carolyn and CJ. There he discovers LARP weaponry, a sword collection, and falconry gear, before Ton reveals their new ride: Betty.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Big Sis Ducks Out
programme.desc: Big Sis drops some bad news as the guys clash with Carolyn over a carnival unit at an auction in Long Beach. Ton and Allen unearth a Native American tomahawk, a dunk tank and a rare gun that can fire three shots at once.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Catch My Drift?
programme.desc: The guys land a custom drift car and a luxury antiques unit that could have a one-of-a-kind pilot pistol from WWI. While trying to track down the provenance of the gun, Ton's lead foot gets them into trouble at their car sale.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Voodoo Moola
programme.desc: Allen & Ton hit a storage auction in Louisiana's Capitol City and quickly find themselves in trouble with the law! The guys uncover a pair of racing lawnmowers and then stumble on an antique barber chair from the early 1900s!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ice, Ice, Baby
programme.desc: Ton and Allen have to get aggressive when they encounter a towering opponent with a mountain of cash. The guys uncover a vintage ice resurfacing machine and an Olympic biathlon rifle!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Viva la Vegas
programme.desc: 1974 death-defying Zig Zag magic sword box, an ultra-rare 1910 poster of the infamous magician Chung Ling Soo, an 1800s naval cane sword and century-old Metlach German beer steins.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Without a Chute
programme.desc: After a tough auction, things get worse when the shop's landlord wants to talk to the guys. Ton tries to negotiate with him while Allen has to put an experimental powered parachute to the test to save the day's profits.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gangster Whiskey
programme.desc: Allen and Ton trek to an auction in Moreno Valley, CA, where two locker wins yield a vintage jukebox, a valuable baseball card and a Prohibition-era moonshine still.

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Cate and Tyler plan a party to reveal the gender of their baby. Maci struggles with Bentley starting kindergarten. Gary invites Amber to be a part of Leah's first day of kindergarten. (S5, ep2)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Tyler posts a video of Carly which upsets Brandon and Teresa. Maci continues to struggle with Ryan about co-parenting. Amber is hurt by Gary because he won't let Leah spend the night. (S5, ep3)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Cate finds out Brandon and Teresa want to discuss adoption issues. Maci reveals that she's expecting a baby. Amber is shocked to find out that Gary is having a baby with Kristina. (S5, ep4)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Cate and Tyler meet with Brandon and Teresa. Maci tells Ryan and his family she's having a baby with Taylor and Amber confronts Gary about his flirting. (S5, ep5)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Cate finds out she has diabetes. Farrah struggles with her mom's visit. Amber reveals her relationship with her boyfriend and Maci quits the show when she finds out Farrah is back. (S5, ep6)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Maci surprises the crew with her return to the series but has some conditions regarding Bentley. Catelynn and Tyler struggle with first time parenthood. Farrah introduces Simon to her mom. (S5, ep7)

programme.title: CSI: New York: Unfriendly Chat
programme.desc: When a young woman appears to be strangled while in a live online chat that Adam witnesses the CSIs must determine if it was real or a hoax.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Damned if You Do
programme.desc: When a couple is found beaten in their home, the CSIs think they have the suspect after a mother ID's her son, but all is not what it seems.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Sangre Por Sangre
programme.desc: When a powerful gang leader is murdered, the CSI New York team of investigators must find the killer before a street war breaks out.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Out of the Sky
programme.desc: A jewel heist at the penthouse of one of New York's most powerful attorneys takes a bizarre turn as the case leads the CSIs to a man in the morgue.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Do Not Pass Go
programme.desc: The CSI New York team of investigators finds a body on a rooftop and must find the killer who is manipulating crime scenes.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Stoned Cold
programme.desc: Horatio Caine and the CSI team try to figure out which of the nerds took revenge when a high school bully is stoned to death.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Blood Lust
programme.desc: When a woman narrowly escapes death at the hands of a serial killer, Horatio will do anything to track down the psychopath.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Hunting Ground
programme.desc: Horatio Caine and the CSI team uncover an exclusive hunting club where the prey is human, the most dangerous game of all.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Special Delivery
programme.desc: When a delivery truck driver and a housewife on his route are murdered, Horatio Caine and the CSI team try to find their connection.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: About Face
programme.desc: An escaped prisoner takes Natalia hostage and tells her a shocking secret about his crimes. Horatio Caine and the rest of CSI the team investigate.

programme.title: Very Scary People: Charles Manson: The Devil’s Work (Part 1)

programme.desc: Continuing from episode 5, Bernard O'Mahoney explores the potential injustices suffered by those who have unwittingly surrounded themselves with criminals.

programme.title: British Gangsters: Faces of the Underworld: My Generation
programme.desc: Bernard O'Mahoney looks at the effect of time on gangs and their reputations. Whether it be organised motorcycle groups or Irish travellers, the roots are dying out with every new generation, but how does this affect the older, more traditional members?

programme.title: British Gangsters: Faces of the Underworld: Your Money or Your Life?
programme.desc: The 70s and 80s saw a change in activity for criminal fraternities. Following the sentencing of the Krays, many gangs turned to armed robbery. Villains saw the banks and armoured cars that transported huge amounts of cash as relatively easy pickings.

programme.title: British Gangsters: Faces of the Underworld: Birmingham
programme.desc: Examining the notorious Peaky Blinders, the flourishing gang culture in the sixties with links to the Krays, and how this culture continues today.

programme.title: British Gangsters: Faces of the Underworld: London
programme.desc: With a history rich in criminal activity, England's capital gives Bernie the chance to meet numerous 'faces' that have shaped London's colourful past, as well as present day names.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fragments
programme.desc: Andy’s former rookie, Duncan, is back on duty and looking to reconcile – something she’s not ready for yet. But personal feelings get thrust aside when a bomb explodes in a downtown parking garage

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Everlasting
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division work to track down TED MCDONALD (the car-bomber from Ep. 510). But even after catching him, they realize Ted has more targets set to explode out there. The clock is ticking

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Open Windows
programme.desc: Andy is attacked by an intruder at Traci’s place and the Sex Crimes Unit steps in to take over the case their way, 15 Division will have decide whether to take matters into their own hands.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Perfect Family
programme.desc: Andy’s ideas about what makes a perfect family are put into perspective when she meets an out-of-control teen who needs to be protected from her own conservative family.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Uprising
programme.desc: A riot breaks out at a women’s correctional institute while Andy, Juliet, Nick, and Gail are there to transfer prisoners. They end up in a lock-down situation that finds Andy and Juliet trapped with a woman desperate to prove her innocence

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Letting Go
programme.desc: When Nick’s estranged older brother emerges with new information on someone from their tragic past, Nick goes off the grid to track the man down. But Juliet is hot on his heels, and Nick is forced to let her into the secrets of his past.

programme.title: Horns
programme.desc: Blamed for the murder of his girlfriend, a man (Daniel Radcliffe) awakes one morning to find he has grown a pair of horns. Armed, now, with supernatural powers, he sets out to find the killer.

programme.title: The Grudge
programme.desc: An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.

programme.title: The Grudge 2
programme.desc: A young woman (Amber Tamblyn) encounters a terrible curse while searching for her missing sister (Sarah Michelle Gellar) in Tokyo.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Mr. Right
programme.desc: Sydney runs into her ex Gray and goes on a holiday with him to Bali, but when Derek Lloyd shows up to enlist her to find Parvati's Bowl, she can't resist.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Sydney at Ten
programme.desc: Sydney's roommate from school is on track of a pendant from her past and enlists Sydney to help find it and catch the killer.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Light of Truth
programme.desc: Arabia 843 AD: A sheik uses the Light of Truth to reveal his general as a traitor. 2001: Prince Shareem drops out from Sydney's class to go search for the Light of Truth.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Treasure Island
programme.desc: Sydney's on the hunt for a Pirate's booty, but will a traitor force her to walk the plank?

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Women Want to Know
programme.desc: Sydney has found a temple with an idol of Ganesha and it is being filmed for TV, but they get trapped inside when the local rebels stumble onto them. Can Nigel and Karen help from USA?

programme.title: Cover Ups Conspiracy : The Chinese Spy Baloon
programme.desc: Objects shot down in US/Canada airspace. Pentagon feigns ignorance. Alien involvement?

programme.title: Alien Global Threat
programme.desc: New evidence reveals that world governments have had a pact with aliens for decades and that human abductions are being allowed by government and military factions.

programme.title: Aliens Among Us: The Michael Wolf Theory
programme.desc: Michael K. Wolf shares 30 years of insights on UFOs, aliens, government projects, and crop circles.

programme.title: Alien Contact: Secret Societies
programme.desc: Thousands of years ago a special, genetically advanced race of beings came to Earth. They were seen as Gods by primitive man and worshipped. They set themselves apart.

programme.title: Red Shoe Diaries
programme.desc: Et jordskjelv rykker Gina fra sengen hennes, rett inn i et nytt liv. Fra sin ydmyke tilværelse til storheten til en fremmeds leilighet i Paris, er det i denne leiligheten Gina vil finne midler til å gjenoppfinne smaken og sensualiteten sin.

programme.title: Red Shoe Diaries
programme.desc: Fra A til Å, alfabetjenta, finner en vakker motemodell at det er tjueseks måter å elske på.

programme.title: Red Shoe Diaries
programme.desc: En uavhengig sjef for et moteselskap og en temperamentsfull kommersiell direktør fra fortiden hennes kolliderer til de kommer til enighet med individuelle konflikter når de finner ut at kjærligheten til hverandre aldri virkelig døde.

programme.title: Red Shoe Diaries
programme.desc: Calahan har en lidenskap for kjoler og Brandy hater dem absolutt. Men med litt, ikke så søt, texansk overtalelse, gir Brandy seg til slutt. Og hun innser at hun elsker mannen som fant veien for å få tilgang til hennes utemmede hjerte.

programme.title: Red Shoe Diaries
programme.desc: Lilly snakker om brettspillet Red Shoe Diaries - en konkurranse med seksuell fantasi og intriger. Fortell... Berør... Vis... Wild Card. Lilly er fanget i en virvelvind av lidenskap og sensualitet, mer uhemmet... og mer besatt.

programme.title: Red Shoe Diaries
programme.desc: Når Juliet, en uskyldig husmor, går og handler etter ektemannens 35-årskake, møter hun Leonardo og hele hennes syn på betydningen av en bursdagskake endres for alltid...for Juliet blir faktisk ektemannens kake.

programme.title: Shivers

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: Hammer Films reanimated the Frankenstein franchise in the 1950s with its terrifying teaming of Peter Cushing and Christopher Lee.

programme.title: Terror Train
programme.desc: Three years after a prank that went terribly awry, the six college students responsible are targeted by a masked killer at a New Year's Eve party aboard a moving train. Starring: Ben Johnson, Jamie Lee Curtis, Hart Bochner, David Copperfield

programme.title: Deadtime Stories
programme.desc: A babysitting uncle tells his charges three horror stories - about a killer witch, Little Red Riding Hood and a werewolf, and "Goldi Lox" and the three bears. Starring: Scott Valentine, Nicole Picard, Matt Mitler

programme.title: Re-Animator: Re-Animator
programme.desc: Brilliant and deranged medical student Herbert has his own outlandish theories and has concocted a serum that will bring the dead back to life. Roping in a fellow student their shocking experiments work all too well with horrific and very messy results.

programme.title: SlasherFest: Masked Psychos - The Farm
programme.desc: FrightFest Presents. A brutal, gore-tastic slasher/survival horror, in the vein of The Texas Chainsaw Massacre and Wolf Creek. While on a road trip a couple decide to stop at a diner.

programme.title: The Pumpkin Karver
programme.desc: After mistaking him for a masked killer, Jonathan fatally stabs his sister’s boyfriend. A year later, the siblings find themselves fighting against a familiar masked murderer.

programme.title: Slumber Party Massacre
programme.desc: A true horror cult classic! A high school student's slumber party turns terrifying as an escaped mental patient with a drill decides to crash the evening. Starring: Michelle Michaels, Robin Stille, Michael Villella

programme.title: Man In The Attic
programme.desc: Jack the Ripper's rampage has all of London gripped in fear. After an enigmatic, self-described pathologist rents the attic room of a Victorian house, his landlady begins to suspect he is Jack the Ripper.

programme.title: Planet of the Sharks
programme.desc: In the near future, glacial melting has covered 98% of earth's landmass. Sharks have flourished and now dominate the planet, operating as one massive school led by a mutated alpha shark.

programme.title: Odd Thomas
programme.desc: In a California desert town, a short-order cook with clairvoyant abilities encounters a mysterious man with a link to dark, threatening forces. Starring: Anton Yelchin, Ashley Sommers, Leonor Varela, Willem Dafoe

programme.title: Rats: Night of Terror
programme.desc: Rats: Night of Terror is a post-apocalyptic pot-boiler sees some of the last humans alive grapple with a horde of flesh-eating rodents - and a shocking final revelation that has fast become director Bruno Mattei's signature 'twist'.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S1 E6 - Thank God It's Friday, Again
programme.desc: The crew visits a planet full of happy workers. Soon D'Argo and Zhaan start working and refuse to return to the ship.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S1 E7 - I, E.T.
programme.desc: A peacekeeper beacon goes off and Moya has to land on an alien planet to prevent its signal being intercepted and Moya being discovered.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S1 E8 - That Old Black Magic
programme.desc: Crichton's spirit is captured by Maldis. The sorcerer thrives on vengeance and hate, he brings Crais's spirit down. And the two spirits battle.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S1 E9 - DNA Mad Scientist
programme.desc: A scientist extracts DNA from several of Moya's crew, promising them that he would be able to use it to find the location of their home planets.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S1 E10 - They've Got A Secret
programme.desc: During routine searches for Peacekeeper beacons, D'Argo falls down a chute, destroys a Peacekeeper shield and gets ejected into open space.
